name: Qatar Airways Cargo 777-FDZ [A7-BFC] Close Up Taxi and Takeoff from Calgary Airport ᴴᴰ
description:
Every year, several equestrian events are held at Spruce Meadows, a facility located to the south of Calgary. Several horses are brought in from all over the world, and needless to say, YYC gets some interesting visitors as a result of that. 

This 777 freighter from Qatar Airways Cargo just so happened to be the same one that came in May, and thankfully came at a much more convenient time. The video includes some shots of the aircraft parked, extensive close up taxi footage with some great GE90 sound, and the takeoff itself. ATC is included as well with captions. Enjoy this rare visitor!

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Qatar Airways Cargo (QAC/QR)
Aircraft: Boeing 777 Freighter (B77F)
Aircraft Name: None
Livery: Standard Qatar Cargo
Engines: 2x GE GE90-110B1 
Registration: A7-BFC
Route: MEX-YYC-LGG-DOH
Callsign: Qatari 8179 heavy
Runway used: 35R
Local Time: 1200
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/A7BFC
____________________________________________________

VIDEO LOG:
00:12 - Static shots of the aircraft parked
00:30 - Taxiing for departure
01:20 - Turning on to taxiway Romeo
03:25 - Communications with ATC
03:55 - Spool up and takeoff roll
